div.p: Diagrams showing by how many percent each of 11 size measures of P. montanus and P. cristatus from SW and SE Sweden exceeds the size of P. ater in the reference sample from SW Sweden. Tarsus refers to tarsus ‘short’. The diagrams are directly comparable to those in Fig. 3, where the size of P. ater from each of 11 sampling places is also compared with the P. ater reference sample from SW Sweden.
